title: Volunteer sign-ups open
body: Sign-ups for the STEM Expo volunteers are open. Please sign up via the form linked in Resources.

title: New funding application deadline
body: Reminder: the mini-grant application is due Nov 30. Templates and submission instructions are in Resources.
